nodes.label: Introduction to Formal Methods
nodes.title: Introduction to Formal Methods
nodes.content: This section introduces the fundamental concepts of formal methods in software verification.

nodes.label: Lean4 Basics
nodes.title: Lean4 Language Basics
nodes.content: Overview of Lean4 syntax and basic proof techniques.

nodes.label: Type Theory
nodes.title: Dependent Type Theory
nodes.content: Mathematical foundations of dependent type systems.

nodes.label: Soundness Lemma
nodes.title: Type System Soundness
nodes.content: Proof that well-typed programs don't get stuck.

nodes.label: Completeness Property
nodes.title: Proof System Completeness
nodes.content: Every valid statement has a proof in the system.

nodes.label: Consistency Check
nodes.title: Logical Consistency
nodes.content: The system cannot prove both P and Â¬P.

nodes.label: Main Correctness Theorem
nodes.title: System Correctness
nodes.content: The complete proof system is sound and complete.

nodes.label: Decidability Result
nodes.title: Type Checking Decidability
nodes.content: Type checking is decidable for our subset of Lean4.

nodes.label: Contradiction Analysis
nodes.title: Handling Contradictions
nodes.content: Methods for detecting and resolving contradictions in formal proofs.

nodes.label: Contradiction Detection
nodes.title: Automated Contradiction Finding
nodes.content: Algorithm for finding contradictions in proof dependencies.
